reasoning:

1. Space Joker: 1 in 4 chance to upgrade level of played poker hand (Uncommon)

The two options:

- 25% chance to upgrade the hand I play
- Over time, this could help level up my Two Pair even more

- Long-term value through hand leveling

**Half Joker**:
- +20 Mult if I play 3 or fewer cards
- Would work with Pair (2 cards) or Three of a Kind (3 cards)
- Doesn't work with my main strategy of Two Pair (requires 4 cards)
- With Troubadour giving me 10 cards, I rarely need to play small hands

My previous reasoning concluded that Space Joker is better because:
1. It can help level up my Two Pair over time
2. It's more flexible - works with any hand type
3. Half Joker doesn't align with my Two Pair strategy

So I should select Space Joker (position 1).
